statements: SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics ORDER BY performance_date DESC, employee_id ASC;
SELECT employee_id, performance_score FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_score > 90;
SELECT performance_score, employee_id, performance_date FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_date = '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE employee_id = 101 ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(performance_score) AS average_score FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(employee_id) > 1;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE employee_id = 1 ORDER BY performance_date DESC, performance_score ASC;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(performance_score) AS avg_score FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics WHERE performance_score > 80 AND performance_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT MAX(performance_score) AS max_score, MIN(performance_score) AS min_score FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics;
SELECT DISTINCT employee_id FROM EmployeePerformanceMetrics ORDER BY employee_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_metrics;
SELECT employee_id, performance_rating FROM employee_performance_metrics WHERE performance_rating > 3;
SELECT * FROM performance_reports ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, report_content FROM performance_reports WHERE report_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT MAX(performance_rating) AS highest_rating FROM employee_performance_metrics;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_metrics WHERE employee_id = 1;
SELECT performance_rating, performance_comments FROM employee_performance_metrics WHERE performance_rating > 3 ORDER BY performance_rating DESC;
SELECT employee_id, report_date FROM performance_reports ORDER BY report_date ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM performance_reports GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_reports > 1;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(performance_rating) AS avg_rating FROM employee_performance_metrics GROUP BY employee_id HAVING avg_rating >= 4;
SELECT * FROM employees;
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE performance_rating > 4;
SELECT employee_id, name, department, hire_date FROM employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics ORDER BY report_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(productivity_score) AS avg_productivity FROM performance_metrics GROUP BY employee_id;
SELECT * FROM employees WHERE department = 'Sales' ORDER BY hire_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT name, department FROM employees WHERE performance_rating > 3 ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT e.name, p.productivity_score FROM employees e INNER JOIN performance_metrics p ON e.employee_id = p.employee_id WHERE e.department = 'Technology'
SELECT * FROM performance_metrics WHERE accuracy_score < 80 ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT r.report_text, e.name FROM reports r INNER JOIN employees e ON r.employee_id = e.employee_id WHERE r.report_date >= '2022-01-01' AND r.report_date <= '2022-03-31'
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_metrics ORDER BY performance_score DESC;
SELECT employee_id, performance_score FROM employee_performance_metrics WHERE performance_score > 80;
SELECT * FROM automation_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM automation_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY task_due_date ASC;
SELECT employee_id, COUNT(report_id) AS num_reports FROM automation_reports GROUP BY employee_id HAVING num_reports > 3;
SELECT * FROM employee_performance_metrics WHERE performance_score > 80 ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT employee_id, AVG(performance_score) AS average_score FROM employee_performance_metrics GROUP BY employee_id HAVING COUNT(employee_id) >= 5;

SELECT a.employee_id, a.performance_score, b.automated_report_text FROM employee_performance_metrics a JOIN automation_reports b ON a.employee_id = b.employee_id WHERE a.performance_score < 70 AND b.report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT task_id, task_description FROM automation_tasks WHERE task_status = 'Pending' ORDER BY task_due_date ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM automated_processes WHERE process_start_timestamp > '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND process_end_timestamp < '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM Employees;
SELECT name, department FROM Employees WHERE department = 'Engineering';
SELECT * FROM Performance ORDER BY performance_date DESC;
SELECT name, position FROM Employees WHERE hire_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_date, employee_id FROM Reports WHERE employee_id = 101;
SELECT * FROM Employees ORDER BY name ASC, department DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT name, hire_date, department FROM Employees WHERE hire_date > '2020-01-01' AND department = 'HR'
SELECT e.name, e.department, p.metric1, p.metric2 FROM Employees e INNER JOIN Performance p ON e.id = p.employee_id WHERE p.metric1 > 80 AND p.metric2 < 50
SELECT r.employee_id, r.report_date, r.report_text, e.name FROM Reports r LEFT JOIN Employees e ON r.employee_id = e.id WHERE r.report_date < '2021-01-01'
SELECT t.task_name, t.task_description, a.name as assigned_to_name FROM AutomationTasks t INNER JOIN Employees a ON t.assigned_to = a.id WHERE t.due_date < '2022-01-01'
